                                                                    # wait/notifyçš„æ¶ˆæ¯é€šçŸ¥æœºåˆ¶

                                                                    # é¢„å¤‡çŸ¥è¯†

                                                                    Java ä¸­ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡é…åˆè°ƒç”¨ Object å¯¹è±¡çš„ wait() æ–¹æ³•å’Œ notify()æ–¹æ³•æˆ– notifyAll() æ–¹æ³•æ¥å®ç°çº¿ç¨‹é—´çš„é€šä¿¡ã€‚åœ¨çº¿ç¨‹ä¸­è°ƒç”¨ wait() æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå°†é˜»å¡å½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œç›´è‡³ç­‰åˆ°å…¶ä»–çº¿ç¨‹è°ƒç”¨äº†è°ƒç”¨ notify() æ–¹æ³•æˆ– notifyAll() æ–¹æ³•è¿›è¡Œé€šçŸ¥ä¹‹åï¼Œå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹æ‰èƒ½ä»wait()æ–¹æ³•å‡ºè¿”å›ï¼Œç»§ç»­æ‰§è¡Œä¸‹é¢çš„æ“ä½œã€‚

                                                                    1. wait

                                                                      è¯¥æ–¹æ³•ç”¨æ¥å°†å½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹ç½®å…¥ä¼‘çœ çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œç›´åˆ°æ¥åˆ°é€šçŸ¥æˆ–è¢«ä¸­æ–­ä¸ºæ­¢ã€‚åœ¨è°ƒç”¨ wait()ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œçº¿ç¨‹å¿…é¡»è¦è·å¾—è¯¥å¯¹è±¡çš„å¯¹è±¡ç›‘è§†å™¨é”ï¼Œå³åªèƒ½åœ¨åŒæ­¥æ–¹æ³•æˆ–åŒæ­¥å—ä¸­è°ƒç”¨ wait()æ–¹æ³•ã€‚è°ƒç”¨wait()æ–¹æ³•ä¹‹åï¼Œå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹ä¼šé‡Šæ”¾é”ã€‚å¦‚æœè°ƒç”¨wait()æ–¹æ³•æ—¶ï¼Œçº¿ç¨‹å¹¶æœªè·å–åˆ°é”çš„è¯ï¼Œåˆ™ä¼šæŠ›å‡ºIllegalMonitorStateExceptionå¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œè¿™æ˜¯ä»¥ä¸ªRuntimeExceptionã€‚å¦‚æœå†æ¬¡è·å–åˆ°é”çš„è¯ï¼Œå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹æ‰èƒ½ä»wait()æ–¹æ³•å¤„æˆåŠŸè¿”å›ã€‚

                                                                    2. notify

                                                                      è¯¥æ–¹æ³•ä¹Ÿè¦åœ¨åŒæ­¥æ–¹æ³•æˆ–åŒæ­¥å—ä¸­è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œå³åœ¨è°ƒç”¨å‰ï¼Œçº¿ç¨‹ä¹Ÿå¿…é¡»è¦è·å¾—è¯¥å¯¹è±¡çš„å¯¹è±¡çº§åˆ«é”ï¼Œå¦‚æœè°ƒç”¨ notify()æ—¶æ²¡æœ‰æŒæœ‰é€‚å½“çš„é”ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¼šæŠ›å‡º IllegalMonitorStateExceptionã€‚ è¯¥æ–¹æ³•ä»»æ„ä»WAITTINGçŠ¶æ€çš„çº¿ç¨‹ä¸­æŒ‘é€‰ä¸€ä¸ªè¿›è¡Œé€šçŸ¥ï¼Œä½¿å¾—è°ƒç”¨wait()æ–¹æ³•çš„çº¿ç¨‹ä»ç­‰å¾…é˜Ÿåˆ—ç§»å…¥åˆ°åŒæ­¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­ï¼Œç­‰å¾…æœ‰æœºä¼šå†ä¸€æ¬¡è·å–åˆ°é”ï¼Œä»è€Œä½¿å¾—è°ƒç”¨wait()æ–¹æ³•çš„çº¿ç¨‹èƒ½å¤Ÿä»wait()æ–¹æ³•å¤„é€€å‡ºã€‚è°ƒç”¨notifyåï¼Œå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹ä¸ä¼šé©¬ä¸Šé‡Šæ”¾è¯¥å¯¹è±¡é”ï¼Œè¦ç­‰åˆ°ç¨‹åºé€€å‡ºåŒæ­¥å—åï¼Œå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹æ‰ä¼šé‡Šæ”¾é”ã€‚

                                                                    3. notifyAll è¯¥æ–¹æ³•ä¸ notify ()æ–¹æ³•çš„å·¥ä½œæ–¹å¼ç›¸åŒï¼Œé‡è¦çš„ä¸€ç‚¹å·®å¼‚æ˜¯ï¼š notifyAll ä½¿æ‰€æœ‰åŸæ¥åœ¨è¯¥å¯¹è±¡ä¸Š wait çš„çº¿ç¨‹ç»Ÿç»Ÿé€€å‡ºWAITTINGçŠ¶æ€ï¼Œä½¿å¾—ä»–ä»¬å…¨éƒ¨ä»ç­‰å¾…é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­ç§»å…¥åˆ°åŒæ­¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­å»ï¼Œç­‰å¾…ä¸‹ä¸€æ¬¡èƒ½å¤Ÿæœ‰æœºä¼šè·å–åˆ°å¯¹è±¡ç›‘è§†å™¨é”ã€‚

                                                                    # wait/notifyæ¶ˆæ¯é€šçŸ¥æ½œåœ¨çš„ä¸€äº›é—®é¢˜

                                                                    # 1.notifyæ—©æœŸé€šçŸ¥

                                                                    notify é€šçŸ¥çš„é—æ¼å¾ˆå®¹æ˜“ç†è§£ï¼Œå³ threadA è¿˜æ²¡å¼€å§‹ wait çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼ŒthreadB å·²ç» notify äº†ï¼Œè¿™æ ·ï¼ŒthreadB é€šçŸ¥æ˜¯æ²¡æœ‰ä»»ä½•å“åº”çš„ï¼Œå½“ threadB é€€å‡º synchronized ä»£ç å—åï¼ŒthreadA å†å¼€å§‹ waitï¼Œä¾¿ä¼šä¸€ç›´é˜»å¡ç­‰å¾…ï¼Œç›´åˆ°è¢«åˆ«çš„çº¿ç¨‹æ‰“æ–­ã€‚æ¯”å¦‚åœ¨ä¸‹é¢çš„ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç ä¸­ï¼Œå°±æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå‡ºnotifyæ—©æœŸé€šçŸ¥å¸¦æ¥çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼š

                                                                    public class EarlyNotify {

    private static String lockObject = "";

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        WaitThread waitThread = new WaitThread(lockObject);
        NotifyThread notifyThread = new NotifyThread(lockObject);
        notifyThread.start();
        try {
            Thread.sleep(3000);
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        waitThread.start();
    }

    static class WaitThread extends Thread {
        private String lock;

        public WaitThread(String lock) {
            this.lock = lock;
        }

        @Override
        public void run() {
            synchronized (lock) {
                try {
                    System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  è¿›å»ä»£ç å—");
                    System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  å¼€å§‹wait");
                    lock.wait();
                    System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "   ç»“æŸwait");
                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
            }
        }
    }

    static class NotifyThread extends Thread {
        private String lock;

        public NotifyThread(String lock) {
            this.lock = lock;
        }

        @Override
        public void run() {
            synchronized (lock) {
                System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  è¿›å»ä»£ç å—");
                System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  å¼€å§‹notify");
                lock.notify();
                System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "   ç»“æŸå¼€å§‹notify");
            }
        }
    }
}

                                                                    ç¤ºä¾‹ä¸­å¼€å¯äº†**ä¸¤ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯WaitThreadï¼Œå¦ä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯NotifyThreadã€‚NotifyThreadä¼šå…ˆå¯åŠ¨ï¼Œå…ˆè°ƒç”¨notifyæ–¹æ³•ã€‚ç„¶åWaitThreadçº¿ç¨‹æ‰å¯åŠ¨ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨waitæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ç”±äºé€šçŸ¥è¿‡äº†ï¼Œwaitæ–¹æ³•å°±æ— æ³•å†è·å–åˆ°ç›¸åº”çš„é€šçŸ¥ï¼Œå› æ­¤WaitThreadä¼šä¸€ç›´åœ¨waitæ–¹æ³•å‡ºé˜»å¡ï¼Œè¿™ç§ç°è±¡å°±æ˜¯é€šçŸ¥è¿‡æ—©çš„ç°è±¡ã€‚**é’ˆå¯¹è¿™ç§ç°è±¡ï¼Œè§£å†³æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬æ˜¯æ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€æ ‡å¿—ï¼Œè®©waitThreadè°ƒç”¨waitæ–¹æ³•å‰å…ˆåˆ¤æ–­çŠ¶æ€æ˜¯å¦å·²ç»æ”¹å˜äº†æ²¡ï¼Œå¦‚æœé€šçŸ¥æ—©å·²å‘å‡ºçš„è¯ï¼ŒWaitThreadå°±ä¸å†å»waitã€‚å¯¹ä¸Šé¢çš„ä»£ç è¿›è¡Œæ›´æ­£ï¼š

                                                                    public class EarlyNotify {

    private static String lockObject = "";
    private static boolean isWait = true;

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        WaitThread waitThread = new WaitThread(lockObject);
        NotifyThread notifyThread = new NotifyThread(lockObject);
        notifyThread.start();
        try {
            Thread.sleep(3000);
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        waitThread.start();
    }

    static class WaitThread extends Thread {
        private String lock;

        public WaitThread(String lock) {
            this.lock = lock;
        }

        @Override
        public void run() {
            synchronized (lock) {
                try {
                    while (isWait) {
                        System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  è¿›å»ä»£ç å—");
                        System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  å¼€å§‹wait");
                        lock.wait();
                        System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "   ç»“æŸwait");
                    }
                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
            }
        }
    }

    static class NotifyThread extends Thread {
        private String lock;

        public NotifyThread(String lock) {
            this.lock = lock;
        }

        @Override
        public void run() {
            synchronized (lock) {
                System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  è¿›å»ä»£ç å—");
                System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  å¼€å§‹notify");
                lock.notifyAll();
                isWait = false;
                System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "   ç»“æŸå¼€å§‹notify");
            }
        }
    }
}

                                                                    è¿™æ®µä»£ç åªæ˜¯å¢åŠ äº†ä¸€ä¸ªisWaitçŠ¶æ€å˜é‡ï¼ŒNotifyThreadè°ƒç”¨notifyæ–¹æ³•åä¼šå¯¹çŠ¶æ€å˜é‡è¿›è¡Œæ›´æ–°ï¼Œåœ¨WaitThreadä¸­è°ƒç”¨waitæ–¹æ³•ä¹‹å‰ä¼šå…ˆå¯¹çŠ¶æ€å˜é‡è¿›è¡Œåˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œåœ¨è¯¥ç¤ºä¾‹ä¸­ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨notifyåå°†çŠ¶æ€å˜é‡isWaitæ”¹å˜ä¸ºfalseï¼Œå› æ­¤ï¼Œåœ¨WaitThreadä¸­whileå¯¹isWaitåˆ¤æ–­åå°±ä¸ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œwaitæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä»è€Œé¿å…äº†Notifyè¿‡æ—©é€šçŸ¥é€ æˆé—æ¼çš„æƒ…å†µã€‚

                                                                    æ€»ç»“ï¼šåœ¨ä½¿ç”¨çº¿ç¨‹çš„ç­‰å¾…/é€šçŸ¥æœºåˆ¶æ—¶ï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬éƒ½è¦é…åˆä¸€ä¸ª boolean å˜é‡å€¼ï¼ˆæˆ–è€…å…¶ä»–èƒ½å¤Ÿåˆ¤æ–­çœŸå‡çš„æ¡ä»¶ï¼‰ï¼Œåœ¨ notify ä¹‹å‰æ”¹å˜è¯¥ boolean å˜é‡çš„å€¼ï¼Œè®© wait è¿”å›åèƒ½å¤Ÿé€€å‡º while å¾ªç¯ï¼ˆä¸€èˆ¬éƒ½è¦åœ¨ wait æ–¹æ³•å¤–å›´åŠ ä¸€å±‚ while å¾ªç¯ï¼Œä»¥é˜²æ­¢æ—©æœŸé€šçŸ¥ï¼‰ï¼Œæˆ–åœ¨é€šçŸ¥è¢«é—æ¼åï¼Œä¸ä¼šè¢«é˜»å¡åœ¨ wait æ–¹æ³•å¤„ã€‚è¿™æ ·ä¾¿ä¿è¯äº†ç¨‹åºçš„æ­£ç¡®æ€§ã€‚

                                                                    # 2.ç­‰å¾…waitçš„æ¡ä»¶å‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–

                                                                    å¦‚æœçº¿ç¨‹åœ¨ç­‰å¾…æ—¶æ¥å—åˆ°äº†é€šçŸ¥ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä¹‹åç­‰å¾…çš„æ¡ä»¶å‘ç”Ÿäº†å˜åŒ–ï¼Œå¹¶æ²¡æœ‰å†æ¬¡å¯¹ç­‰å¾…æ¡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œåˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¼šå¯¼è‡´ç¨‹åºå‡ºç°é”™è¯¯ã€‚

                                                                    ä¸‹é¢ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªä¾‹å­æ¥è¯´æ˜è¿™ç§æƒ…å†µ

                                                                    public class ConditionChange {
	private static List<String> lockObject = new ArrayList();
	
	
	public static void main(String[] args) {
	    Consumer consumer1 = new Consumer(lockObject);
	    Consumer consumer2 = new Consumer(lockObject);
	    Productor productor = new Productor(lockObject);
	    consumer1.start();
	    consumer2.start();
	    productor.start();
	}
	
	
	static class Consumer extends Thread {
	    private List<String> lock;
	
	    public Consumer(List lock) {
	        this.lock = lock;
	    }
	
	    @Override
	    public void run() {
	        synchronized (lock) {
	            try {
	                //è¿™é‡Œä½¿ç”¨ifçš„è¯ï¼Œå°±ä¼šå­˜åœ¨waitæ¡ä»¶å˜åŒ–é€ æˆç¨‹åºé”™è¯¯çš„é—®é¢˜
	                if (lock.isEmpty()) {
	                    System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + " listä¸ºç©º");
	                    System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + " è°ƒç”¨waitæ–¹æ³•");
	                    lock.wait();
	                    System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  waitæ–¹æ³•ç»“æŸ");
	                }
	                String element = lock.remove(0);
	                System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + " å–å‡ºç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ä¸ºï¼š" + element);
	            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
	                e.printStackTrace();
	            }
	        }
	    }
	
	}
	
	
	static class Productor extends Thread {
	    private List<String> lock;
	
	    public Productor(List lock) {
	        this.lock = lock;
	    }
	
	    @Override
	    public void run() {
	        synchronized (lock) {
	            System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + " å¼€å§‹æ·»åŠ å…ƒç´ ");
	            lock.add(Thread.currentThread().getName());
	            lock.notifyAll();
	        }
	    }
	
	}
}

                                                                    **è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼š**é€šè¿‡ä¸Šé¢çš„åˆ†æï¼Œå¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºConsumer2æŠ¥å¼‚å¸¸æ˜¯å› ä¸ºçº¿ç¨‹ä»waitæ–¹æ³•é€€å‡ºä¹‹åæ²¡æœ‰å†æ¬¡å¯¹waitæ¡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œåˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œå› æ­¤ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶çš„waitæ¡ä»¶å·²ç»å‘ç”Ÿäº†å˜åŒ–ã€‚è§£å†³åŠæ³•å°±æ˜¯ï¼Œåœ¨waité€€å‡ºä¹‹åå†å¯¹æ¡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œåˆ¤æ–­å³å¯ã€‚

                                                                    public class ConditionChange {
	private static List<String> lockObject = new ArrayList();
	
	
	public static void main(String[] args) {
	    Consumer consumer1 = new Consumer(lockObject);
	    Consumer consumer2 = new Consumer(lockObject);
	    Productor productor = new Productor(lockObject);
	    consumer1.start();
	    consumer2.start();
	    productor.start();
	}
	
	
	static class Consumer extends Thread {
	    private List<String> lock;
	
	    public Consumer(List lock) {
	        this.lock = lock;
	    }
	
	    @Override
	    public void run() {
	        synchronized (lock) {
	            try {
	                //è¿™é‡Œä½¿ç”¨ifçš„è¯ï¼Œå°±ä¼šå­˜åœ¨waitæ¡ä»¶å˜åŒ–é€ æˆç¨‹åºé”™è¯¯çš„é—®é¢˜
	                while (lock.isEmpty()) {
	                    System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + " listä¸ºç©º");
	                    System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + " è°ƒç”¨waitæ–¹æ³•");
	                    lock.wait();
	                    System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  waitæ–¹æ³•ç»“æŸ");
	                }
	                String element = lock.remove(0);
	                System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + " å–å‡ºç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ä¸ºï¼š" + element);
	            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
	                e.printStackTrace();
	            }
	        }
	    }
	
	}
	
	
	static class Productor extends Thread {
	    private List<String> lock;
	
	    public Productor(List lock) {
	        this.lock = lock;
	    }
	
	    @Override
	    public void run() {
	        synchronized (lock) {
	            System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + " å¼€å§‹æ·»åŠ å…ƒç´ ");
	            lock.add(Thread.currentThread().getName());
	            lock.notifyAll();
	        }
	    }
	
	}
}

                                                                    æ€»ç»“ï¼šåœ¨ä½¿ç”¨çº¿ç¨‹çš„ç­‰å¾…/é€šçŸ¥æœºåˆ¶æ—¶ï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬éƒ½è¦åœ¨ while å¾ªç¯ä¸­è°ƒç”¨ wait()æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå› æ­¤xuyé…åˆä½¿ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ª boolean å˜é‡ï¼ˆæˆ–å…¶ä»–èƒ½åˆ¤æ–­çœŸå‡çš„æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œå¦‚æœ¬æ–‡ä¸­çš„ list.isEmpty()ï¼‰ï¼Œæ»¡è¶³ while å¾ªç¯çš„æ¡ä»¶æ—¶ï¼Œè¿›å…¥ while å¾ªç¯ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œ wait()æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä¸æ»¡è¶³ while å¾ªç¯çš„æ¡ä»¶æ—¶ï¼Œè·³å‡ºå¾ªç¯ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œåé¢çš„ä»£ç ã€‚

                                                                    # 3. â€œå‡æ­»â€çŠ¶æ€

                                                                    ç°è±¡ï¼šå¦‚æœæ˜¯å¤šæ¶ˆè´¹è€…å’Œå¤šç”Ÿäº§è€…æƒ…å†µï¼Œå¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨notifyæ–¹æ³•å¯èƒ½ä¼šå‡ºç°â€œå‡æ­»â€çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œå³å”¤é†’çš„æ˜¯åŒç±»çº¿ç¨‹ã€‚

                                                                    è§£å†³åŠæ³•ï¼šå°†notifyæ–¹æ³•æ›¿æ¢æˆnotifyAllæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯lockçš„è¯ï¼Œå°±å°†signalæ–¹æ³•æ›¿æ¢æˆsignalAllæ–¹æ³•ã€‚

                                                                    åœ¨Objectæä¾›çš„æ¶ˆæ¯é€šçŸ¥æœºåˆ¶åº”è¯¥éµå¾ªå¦‚ä¸‹è¿™äº›æ¡ä»¶ï¼š

                                                                    1. æ°¸è¿œåœ¨whileå¾ªç¯ä¸­å¯¹æ¡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œåˆ¤æ–­è€Œä¸æ˜¯ifè¯­å¥ä¸­è¿›è¡Œwaitæ¡ä»¶çš„åˆ¤æ–­ï¼›

                                                                    // The standard idiom for calling the wait method in Java 
synchronized (sharedObject) { 
    while (condition) { 
    sharedObject.wait(); 
        // (Releases lock, and reacquires on wakeup) 
    } 
    // do action based upon condition e.g. take or put into queue 
}

                                                                    # wait/notifyAllå®ç°ç”Ÿäº§è€…-æ¶ˆè´¹è€…

                                                                    åˆ©ç”¨wait/notifyAllå®ç°ç”Ÿäº§è€…å’Œæ¶ˆè´¹è€…ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                                                    public class ProductorConsumer {


    public static void main(String[] args) {

        LinkedList linkedList = new LinkedList();
        ExecutorService service = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(15);
        for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
            service.submit(new Productor(linkedList, 8));
        }

        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
            service.submit(new Consumer(linkedList));
        }

    }

    static class Productor implements Runnable {

        private List<Integer> list;
        private int maxLength;

        public Productor(List list, int maxLength) {
            this.list = list;
            this.maxLength = maxLength;
        }

        @Override
        public void run() {
            while (true) {
                synchronized (list) {
                    try {
                        while (list.size() == maxLength) {
                            System.out.println("ç”Ÿäº§è€…" + Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  listä»¥è¾¾åˆ°æœ€å¤§å®¹é‡ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œwait");
                            list.wait();
                            System.out.println("ç”Ÿäº§è€…" + Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  é€€å‡ºwait");
                        }
                        Random random = new Random();
                        int i = random.nextInt();
                        System.out.println("ç”Ÿäº§è€…" + Thread.currentThread().getName() + " ç”Ÿäº§æ•°æ®" + i);
                        list.add(i);
                        list.notifyAll();
                    } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                        e.printStackTrace();
                    }
                }

            }
        }
    }


    static class Consumer implements Runnable {

        private List<Integer> list;

        public Consumer(List list) {
            this.list = list;
        }

        @Override
        public void run() {
            while (true) {
                synchronized (list) {
                    try {
                        while (list.isEmpty()) {
                            System.out.println("æ¶ˆè´¹è€…" + Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  listä¸ºç©ºï¼Œè¿›è¡Œwait");
                            list.wait();
                            System.out.println("æ¶ˆè´¹è€…" + Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  é€€å‡ºwait");
                        }
                        Integer element = list.remove(0);
                        System.out.println("æ¶ˆè´¹è€…" + Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  æ¶ˆè´¹æ•°æ®ï¼š" + element);
                        list.notifyAll();
                    } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                        e.printStackTrace();
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

}

                                                                    # ä½¿ç”¨Lockä¸­Conditionçš„await/signalAllå®ç°ç”Ÿäº§è€…-æ¶ˆè´¹è€…

                                                                    å‚ç…§Objectçš„waitå’Œnotify/notifyAllæ–¹æ³•ï¼ŒConditionä¹Ÿæä¾›äº†åŒæ ·çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

                                                                    # é’ˆå¯¹waitæ–¹æ³•

                                                                    void await() throws InterruptedExceptionï¼šå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹è¿›å…¥ç­‰å¾…çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œå¦‚æœå…¶ä»–çº¿ç¨‹è°ƒç”¨conditionçš„signalæˆ–è€…signalAllæ–¹æ³•å¹¶ä¸”å½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹è·å–Lockä»awaitæ–¹æ³•è¿”å›ï¼Œå¦‚æœåœ¨ç­‰å¾…çŠ¶æ€ä¸­è¢«ä¸­æ–­ä¼šæŠ›å‡ºè¢«ä¸­æ–­å¼‚å¸¸ï¼›

                                                                    long awaitNanos(long nanosTimeout)ï¼šå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹è¿›å…¥ç­‰å¾…çŠ¶æ€ç›´åˆ°è¢«é€šçŸ¥ï¼Œä¸­æ–­æˆ–è€…è¶…æ—¶ï¼›

                                                                    boolean await(long time, TimeUnit unit)throws InterruptedExceptionï¼šåŒç¬¬äºŒç§ï¼Œæ”¯æŒè‡ªå®šä¹‰æ—¶é—´å•ä½

                                                                    boolean awaitUntil(Date deadline) throws InterruptedExceptionï¼šå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹è¿›å…¥ç­‰å¾…çŠ¶æ€ç›´åˆ°è¢«é€šçŸ¥ï¼Œä¸­æ–­æˆ–è€…åˆ°äº†æŸä¸ªæ—¶é—´

                                                                    # é’ˆå¯¹notifyæ–¹æ³•

                                                                    void signal()ï¼šå”¤é†’ä¸€ä¸ªç­‰å¾…åœ¨conditionä¸Šçš„çº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œå°†è¯¥çº¿ç¨‹ä»ç­‰å¾…é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­è½¬ç§»åˆ°åŒæ­¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­ï¼Œå¦‚æœåœ¨åŒæ­¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­èƒ½å¤Ÿç«äº‰åˆ°Lockåˆ™å¯ä»¥ä»ç­‰å¾…æ–¹æ³•ä¸­è¿”å›ã€‚

                                                                    void signalAll()ï¼šä¸1çš„åŒºåˆ«åœ¨äºèƒ½å¤Ÿå”¤é†’æ‰€æœ‰ç­‰å¾…åœ¨conditionä¸Šçš„çº¿ç¨‹

                                                                    ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´wait--->awaitï¼Œnotify---->Signalã€‚

                                                                    å¦‚æœé‡‡ç”¨lockä¸­Conditonçš„æ¶ˆæ¯é€šçŸ¥åŸç†æ¥å®ç°ç”Ÿäº§è€…-æ¶ˆè´¹è€…é—®é¢˜ï¼ŒåŸç†åŒä½¿ç”¨wait/notifyAllä¸€æ ·ã€‚ç›´æ¥ä¸Šä»£ç ï¼š

                                                                    public class ProductorConsumer {

    private static ReentrantLock lock = new ReentrantLock();
    private static Condition full = lock.newCondition();
    private static Condition empty = lock.newCondition();

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        LinkedList linkedList = new LinkedList();
        ExecutorService service = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(15);
        for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
            service.submit(new Productor(linkedList, 8, lock));
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
            service.submit(new Consumer(linkedList, lock));
        }

    }

    static class Productor implements Runnable {

        private List<Integer> list;
        private int maxLength;
        private Lock lock;

        public Productor(List list, int maxLength, Lock lock) {
            this.list = list;
            this.maxLength = maxLength;
            this.lock = lock;
        }

        @Override
        public void run() {
            while (true) {
                lock.lock();
                try {
                    while (list.size() == maxLength) {
                        System.out.println("ç”Ÿäº§è€…" + Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  listä»¥è¾¾åˆ°æœ€å¤§å®¹é‡ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œwait");
                        full.await();
                        System.out.println("ç”Ÿäº§è€…" + Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  é€€å‡ºwait");
                    }
                    Random random = new Random();
                    int i = random.nextInt();
                    System.out.println("ç”Ÿäº§è€…" + Thread.currentThread().getName() + " ç”Ÿäº§æ•°æ®" + i);
                    list.add(i);
                    empty.signalAll();
                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                } finally {
                    lock.unlock();
                }
            }
        }
    }


    static class Consumer implements Runnable {

        private List<Integer> list;
        private Lock lock;

        public Consumer(List list, Lock lock) {
            this.list = list;
            this.lock = lock;
        }

        @Override
        public void run() {
            while (true) {
                lock.lock();
                try {
                    while (list.isEmpty()) {
                        System.out.println("æ¶ˆè´¹è€…" + Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  listä¸ºç©ºï¼Œè¿›è¡Œwait");
                        empty.await();
                        System.out.println("æ¶ˆè´¹è€…" + Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  é€€å‡ºwait");
                    }
                    Integer element = list.remove(0);
                    System.out.println("æ¶ˆè´¹è€…" + Thread.currentThread().getName() + "  æ¶ˆè´¹æ•°æ®ï¼š" + element);
                    full.signalAll();
                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                } finally {
                    lock.unlock();
                }
            }
        }
    }

}

                                                                    # ä½¿ç”¨BlockingQueueå®ç°ç”Ÿäº§è€…-æ¶ˆè´¹è€…

                                                                    ç”±äºBlockingQueueå†…éƒ¨å®ç°å°±é™„åŠ äº†ä¸¤ä¸ªé˜»å¡æ“ä½œã€‚å³å½“é˜Ÿåˆ—å·²æ»¡æ—¶ï¼Œé˜»å¡å‘é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­æ’å…¥æ•°æ®çš„çº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œç›´è‡³é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­æœªæ»¡ï¼›å½“é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸ºç©ºæ—¶ï¼Œé˜»å¡ä»é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­è·å–æ•°æ®çš„çº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œç›´è‡³é˜Ÿåˆ—éç©ºæ—¶ä¸ºæ­¢ã€‚å¯ä»¥åˆ©ç”¨BlockingQueueå®ç°ç”Ÿäº§è€…-æ¶ˆè´¹è€…ä¸ºé¢˜ï¼Œé˜»å¡é˜Ÿåˆ—å®Œå…¨å¯ä»¥å……å½“å…±äº«æ•°æ®åŒºåŸŸï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥å¾ˆå¥½çš„å®Œæˆç”Ÿäº§è€…å’Œæ¶ˆè´¹è€…çº¿ç¨‹ä¹‹é—´çš„åä½œã€‚

                                                                    public class ProductorConsumer {

    private static LinkedBlockingQueue<Integer> queue = new LinkedBlockingQueue<>();

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ExecutorService service = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(15);
        for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
            service.submit(new Productor(queue));
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
            service.submit(new Consumer(queue));
        }
    }


    static class Productor implements Runnable {

        private BlockingQueue queue;

        public Productor(BlockingQueue queue) {
            this.queue = queue;
        }

        @Override
        public void run() {
            try {
                while (true) {
                    Random random = new Random();
                    int i = random.nextInt();
                    System.out.println("ç”Ÿäº§è€…" + Thread.currentThread().getName() + "ç”Ÿäº§æ•°æ®" + i);
                    queue.put(i);
                }
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

    static class Consumer implements Runnable {
        private BlockingQueue queue;

        public Consumer(BlockingQueue queue) {
            this.queue = queue;
        }

        @Override
        public void run() {
            try {
                while (true) {
                    Integer element = (Integer) queue.take();
                    System.out.println("æ¶ˆè´¹è€…" + Thread.currentThread().getName() + "æ­£åœ¨æ¶ˆè´¹æ•°æ®" + element);
                }
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

}
